author: Adewale Olarinde
title: Tesla refuses to sell Bitcoin in Q3 — and earnings show it didn’t need to
description: Tesla’s latest earnings confirm it hasn’t sold any Bitcoin, keeping its $1.3 billion holdings intact. The sustained holdings comes, even as Tesla posts stronger profits and record energy revenue.
content:
Key Takeaways
Did Tesla sell any Bitcoin in Q3?
No. Tesla held its full stack of 11,500 BTC through Q3 2025, now valued at $1.315 billion.
